projects.title: Farmaku.com
projects.tags: Apotek Online, E-commerce, HealthTech, Farmasi, Frontend Developer, UI/UX, SEO, iOS, Android, Retail
projects.description: Farmaku adalah apotek online terpercaya di Indonesia. Platform ini menyediakan obat resep, obat OTC, produk kesehatan, kecantikan, perawatan tubuh, dan alat kesehatan.

projects.title: CDI Facility Services
projects.tags: Cleaning Service, Facility Management, Mobile App, Service Industry, Frontend Developer, UI/UX, iOS, Android
projects.description: A mobile application for CDI Facility Services, a professional cleaning service company in Indonesia. The app helps manage cleaning schedules, service requests, and customer communication efficiently.

projects.title: My Stock by Securerx
projects.tags: Inventory, Stock Opname, Internal Tools, HealthTech, Farmasi, Mobile App, Frontend Developer, iOS, Android
projects.description: An internal stock opname (inventory management) application developed for Farmaku. The app helps streamline stock tracking, counting, and reporting within the pharmacy supply chain.
images: My Stock by Securerx (Stock Opname App)/list-scanned-barcode.png
My Stock by Securerx (Stock Opname App)/scan-add-barcode.png

projects.title: SecureRx POS
projects.tags: Point of Sales, POS, Internal Tools, Pharmacy, Retail, HealthTech, Farmasi, Frontend Developer
projects.description: Point of Sales (POS) application developed for Farmaku.com. This app enables efficient transaction processing, inventory syncing, and sales reporting for pharmacy operations.

projects.title: SecureRx
projects.tags: Internal System, CMS, Pharmacy, HealthTech, E-commerce, Operations, Farmasi, Web App
projects.description: A comprehensive internal system and CMS developed for Farmaku.com. SecureRx manages product catalogs, inventory, sales, users, and operational workflows, serving as the backbone for Farmaku’s digital pharmacy platform.

projects.title: HRM by SecureRx
projects.tags: HRM, Human Resource Management, Internal Tools, Employee Management, Payroll, Attendance, Farmasi, Web App, iOS, Android
projects.description: An internal Human Resource Management (HRM) application for Farmaku. This app helps manage employee data, attendance, payroll, and HR workflows in a centralized system.

projects.title: Mentari Express
projects.tags: STNK Services, Vehicle Administration, Custom License Plates, Logistics, Internal Tools, Web App
projects.description: A specialized vehicle administration service in Jakarta—handling custom license plates, STNK renewal, ownership transfer, mutation, and more with convenient document pickup.

projects.title: Mentari Express CMS
projects.tags: Internal System, CMS, Vehicle Administration, STNK Services, Management, Web App
projects.description: An internal CMS developed for Mentari Express to manage services, customers, and workflows—supporting STNK renewals, ownership transfers, and other vehicle administration processes.

projects.title: Deli Metropolitan Group (Internal System)
projects.tags: Internal System, CMS, Enterprise, Management, Operations, Web App
projects.description: An internal system developed for Deli Metropolitan Group to manage enterprise operations, internal workflows, and organizational processes across departments.

projects.title: Intersys Car Audio
projects.tags: Car Audio, Automotive, E-commerce, Electronics, Web App, UI/UX
projects.description: A digital platform for Intersys Car Audio, a leading automotive audio and electronics brand. The system supports product showcase, e-commerce, and customer engagement for the Indonesian market.

projects.title: Media Audio
projects.tags: Car Audio, Automotive, Electronics, E-commerce, Web App, UI/UX
projects.description: A digital platform for Media Audio, providing premium car audio and automotive electronics. The system showcases products, supports e-commerce, and enhances customer engagement online.

projects.title: Massindo Mentari
projects.tags: In-Car Multimedia, Automotive Electronics, Distribution, E-commerce, Web App, Product Showcase
projects.description: A digital platform for Massindo Mentari, a leading distributor of in-car multimedia products in Indonesia. The system supports product showcasing, distribution management, and customer engagement online.

projects.title: Nexindo Audio Nugraha
projects.tags: Car Audio, Automotive Electronics, Distribution, Web App, Product Showcase
projects.description: A digital presence for Nexindo Audio Nugraha—PCA Professional Car Audio Indonesia—distributing premium car audio brands like Scan-Speak, Zapco, PCA, Stinger, Dynaudio, and more.

projects.title: Toyota Motor Manufacturing (Auto-Generated Reporting)
projects.tags: Automotive, Manufacturing, Reporting System, Data Automation, Monitoring, Internal Tools
projects.description: An auto-generated reporting system for PT. Toyota Motor Manufacturing Indonesia. The system automatically generates daily production reports with furnace temperature monitoring, resource consumption tracking, alarm logs, and countermeasure records—helping streamline operations and decision-making.

projects.title: Farmaku Article
projects.tags: Content Platform, WordPress, Articles, Blog, Health & Beauty, Web App
projects.description: A WordPress-based article section serving health, beauty, and wellness content for Farmaku users—covering topics like parenting, skincare, supplements, and lifestyle.

projects.title: Inni Zheng He Carbon
projects.tags: Manufacturing, Industrial, Activated Carbon, Distributor, Company Profile, SEO, Compro, Web App
projects.description: Corporate website with product showcase and SEO-optimized content for PT. Inni Zheng He Carbon, featuring activated carbon products (coconut shell & palm kernel shell), applications (air, water, precious metals), and company credentials.

projects.title: Begja Autotronics
projects.tags: Car Audio, Automotive, Installation, Accessories, Custom Sound System, Company Profile, Compro, Web App
projects.description: Corporate website for Begja Autotronics, a leading car audio and video entertainment workshop in Jakarta. Features product showcase, service offerings, company profile, and a portfolio of custom car sound system installations.
